ComicInfo.Summary:
There's a new sheriff in the town of Salvation, and he quickly comes to odds with the toughest player in the area: the Meatman, Odin Quincannon! And what shocking secret does Jesse discover about Jodie that irrevocably changes their relationship?
Odin Quincannon tries to show Jesse who's boss - with predictable results; Jesse and Deputy Daggett go shooting; much is learned about Jodie.

ComicInfo.Title: The Meatman Cometh
